ing: 2 1/2 tablespoons marshmallow cream (such as Marshmallow FluffÂ®)
des: "Old fashioned peanut butter and marshmallow fluff sammmies! This unusual, wonderful flavor is great for a kid's snack."
ins: Spread the peanut butter onto one slice of bread. Spread the marshmallow creme onto the other slice. Place the bread topping-side-up onto a microwave-safe plate. Cook in the microwave on High for 30 seconds. Place the two halves together and serve.
